cambodian.text: "A husband should not talk of pretty girls in front of his wife."
"Active hands, full bellies."
"Stealing may bring profit, but hanging costs far more."
"Stealing may bring profit, but hanging costs far more."
"The boat sails by, the shore remains."
"With water make rivers, with rice make armies."
"With water make rivers, with rice make armies."
"The boat sails by, the shore remains."
"Don’t let an angry man wash dishes; don’t let a hungry man guard rice."
"You can’t claim heaven as your own if you are just going to sit under it."
"Don’t shoot people you hate; don’t lend to those you love."
"The tiger depends on the forest; the forest depends on the tiger."
"If you know a lot, know enough to make them respect you, if you are stupid, be stupid enough so they can pity you."
"A husband should not talk of pretty girls in front of his wife."
"If you are doing wrong, make sure you don’t get fat from it."
"For news of the heart ask the face."
"With water make rivers, with rice make armies."
"Cultivate a heart of love that knows no danger."
"If you are patient in a moment of anger, you will spare yourself one hundred days of tears."
"Don’t take the straight path or the winding path. Take the path your ancestors have taken."
"Don’t take rich people as examples."
"Don’t shoot people you hate; don’t lend to those you love."
"Active hands, full bellies."
"Stealing may bring profit, but hanging costs far more."
"The elephant that is stuck in the mud will tear down the tree with it."
"You don’t have to cut a tree down to get at the fruit."
"Negotiate a river by following its bends, enter a country by following its customs."
"The immature rice stalk stands erect, while the mature stalk, heavy with grain, bends over."
"Don’t let women who attract attention walk behind you."
"People give, but don’t be in a hurry to take."
"People give, but don’t be in a hurry to take."
"Don’t shoot people you hate; don’t lend to those you love."
